reviewText: nice vhs tape bought it for my mum.
What  a great singer!!! Glad to be able to hear him on this historic recording! What a performer he was!

Bjoerling was hard to beat in opera and has a certain charm (if not comfort) in the lighter repertoire on this release. Highly recommended for anyone interested in the great singers of the not too distant past.

Wow!!  I knew jussi was good from listening to his many recordings on CD and vinyl (of which I am a devoted follower) but this video brings his recordings to life.  An experience I never would have thought possible. It's a MUST BUY for all devotees of quality music.
